** We note that some users are unaware that video can be viewed in full screen landscape mode. To access this, touch the the video or live stream while viewing it to reveal the arrow in the bottom right hand corner. If you touch this you will go into full

LAUNCHED: We’re excited to bring you a great new iPad experience in portrait and landscape, available to all users for free. With new features including Picture in Picture and Split View; watch and read the news while using other apps.

Users of the

FIXED – A bug that caused an ad to open in Safari when opening the app

UPDATED – As requested by some of our users, you can now get to our live blogs directly from Top Stories and other section pages
– View all images in full screen, not just im

FIXED
- Bug fixes to prevent crashes
- A bug that caused videos to play when swiping

NEW
- A great new video experience showcasing the latest Sky News video in one place
- You can now see the duration of a video before playing it

Fixed an issue that could cause the app to freeze when opening an article, as well as other stability improvements.
Fixed an issue that could cause the app to freeze when opening an article, as well as other stability improvements.

There's something you need to know!

In order to continue supporting future iOS updates, and to continue introducing new functionality into the app, we will soon be dropping iOS 9 support for the Sky News app. You will be unable to upgrade to future

• So we can deliver the best experience, we've dropped support for iOS 9 making iOS 10 the minimum required operating system. You'll still be able to enjoy the app, but will have to update your OS to receive the latest updates and fixes.
• We've also m

• We've added a number of accessibility improvements to help when navigating around the app.
• We've made links within articles less sensitive, as well as other bug fixes and stability improvements.
We have made a number of bug fixes and stability improvements
We have made updates to our cookie privacy notice. We have also made a number of performance improvements.
We have made updates to fix issues affecting users who have upgraded to iOS14.
We have made important updates so we can continue to monitor the performance and stability of the app as well as updating our advertising software.
